content: मार्ग् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (मार्गति, मार्गयति-ते) {@--1@} To seek, seek for. {@--2@} To hunt after, chase. {@--3@} To strive to attain, strive after; आत्मोत्कर्षं न मार्गेत परेषां परिनिंदया . स्वगुणैरेव मार्गेत विप्रकर्षं पृथग्जनात् <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--4@} To solicit, beg, ask for; वरं वरेण्यो नृपतेरमा र्गीत् <ls>Bk. 1. 12</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 66.</ls> {@--5@} To ask in marriage. {@--6@} To seek through, trace out. {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (मार्गयति-ते) {@--1@} To go, move. {@--2@} To decorate, adorn. --WITH परि to seek, look out for.
